Dancing Lights.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range and can move them while the spell lasts.

Prestidigitation.description: You perform minor magical tricks: create a harmless sensory effect, clean or soil a small object, chill/warm/flavor a small amount of material, light or snuff a small flame, or create a small nonmagical trinket/mark. The exact effect is cosmetic and at the DMâ€™s discretion.
